ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The members of the Surveillance of Hospitalized Cases of Severe Influenza in Catalonia (PIDIRAC) working group are: Ana Martínez, Anna Vilella, Angeles Marcos, Maria del Mar Mosquera, Delia Garcia, Elena Espejo, Fernando Barcenilla, Gemma Navarro, Joaquim Ferràs, Irene Barrabeig, Jordi Pou, Josep Álvarez, Josep Rebull, Lluís Force, Maria Rosa Sala, Montserrat Riera, Neus Camps, Núria Freixas, Núria Torner, Pere Godoy, Pilar Gorrindo, Cristina Rius, Rafael Pérez, Encarna Maraver, Dolors Mas, Mònica Carol, Roser Torra, Gloria Solà, Sofia Minguell, Graciano Garcia, Montserrat Olona, Ana Alvarez, Josep Maria Ramon Torrel, Cristina Masuet, Josep Maria Mòdol, Tomàs Pumarola, Andrés Antón, Magda Campins. Sentinel hospitals: Hospital Clínic of Barcelona, Hospital Universitari Vall d’Hebrón, Hospital Josep Trueta, Hospital de Terrassa, Mútua Terrassa, Hospital Althaia Manresa, Hospital Verge de la Cinta, Hospital Sant Joan de Déu, Hospital Joan XXIII, Hospital Arnau de Vilanova, Consorci Sanitari Parc Taulí, Hospital de Mataró. The Catalan Agency supported this study for the Management of Grants for University Research (AGAUR Grant number 2017 SGR 1342). The funders had no rule in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
